************** Débogage JIT **************
Pour activer le débogage juste-à-temps (JIT), le fichier de configuration pour cette
application ou cet ordinateur (machine.config) doit avoir la valeur
jitDebugging définie dans la section system.windows.forms.
L'application doit également être compilée avec le débogage
activé.
 
Par exemple :
 
<configuration>
    <system.windows.forms jitDebugging="true" />
</configuration>
 
Lorsque le débogage juste-à-temps est activé, les exceptions non gérées
seront envoyées au débogueur JIT inscrit sur l'ordinateur
plutôt que d'être gérées par cette boîte de dialogue.

It happens when I try to load possible upgrades from the armory

Comments.Message: In fact it's the same error another person was having with b8... some localization problem I suppose
Forgot to tell... I'm using b9 :-s
Hmm... Interesting. Is there anyone with french Vista that could chat with me on MSN (cnervig@hotmail.com) or AIM (Astro tSD), and try a few test builds, to see if we can figure this out?
I could chat on msn but only after 21:20 GMT+2 on Wednesday (the other days are for raiding)
That would be... 12:20pm PST? That's fine, IM me on MSN.
Seems like you're busy atm. I'll leave home for the Xmas holidays on friday so... Merry Xmas ;-)

So... The error is still there in b10, but it doesn't crash anymore (tested with XP and Vista). I sent you a snapshot on Hotmail.

I happens when trying to get updates from the armory... and then again not always... looks like it's an european armory problem
Do you still receive this error in b11?
yes but it's a problem coming from the european Armory, not from Rawr. I suppose this issue can be closed

I wouldn't close it just yet.  Lets at least see if we can track down exactly what is causing it so we can display a more friendly error message then the stack trace.

Can you describe how exactly to reproduce this error?  You stated its an EU armory issue.  Is it random or does it happen regularly enough to potentially reproduce?
No fixed pattern... looks random to me. It just sometimes happens when trying to update the item cache
it also happens more than once, for different slots (usually 2-3 times during the update)
